entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with a few flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High plus 4.
